/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The street is lined with tall trees, their leaves a vibrant green, standing like sentinels on either side. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
